ggplot2 theme from avom

Source: R/ggplot2-themes.R
theme_avom.Rd

ggplot2 theme based on gruvbox color palette and Fira Sans font.

Usage

theme_avom(
  font_family = "Fira Sans",
  font_size = 10,
  font_color = "#282828",
  backround_color = "#faf7eb",
  gridlines_color = "#cfcbc6",
  ...
)

Arguments

font_family

Font family. Defaults to "Fira Sans".

font_size

Baseline size for text. Defaults to 10.

font_color

Font color. Defaults to "#282828".

backround_color

Backround color. Defaults to "#fbf1c7".

gridlines_color

Color of gridlines. Defaults to "#d1c8c0".

...

Other arguments passed to ggplot2::theme_minimal().

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
ggplot2::ggplot(data = mtcars,
                mapping = ggplot2::aes(x = mpg, y = hp)) +
         ggplot2::geom_point() +
         theme_avom()
         } # }
